methods: abstract void fastForward() Start fast forwarding.
abstract void pause() Request that the player pause its playback and stay at its current position.
abstract void play() Request that the player start its playback at its current position.
abstract void rewind() Start rewinding.
abstract void seekTo(long pos) Move to a new location in the media stream.
abstract void setRating(RatingCompat rating) Rate the current content.
abstract void skipToNext() Skip to the next item.
abstract void skipToPrevious() Skip to the previous item.
abstract void stop() Request that the player stop its playback; it may clear its state in whatever way is appropriate.
